message: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
author: Steve Jobs

message: Life is what happens when you're busy making other plans.
author: John Lennon

message: The purpose of our lives is to be happy.
author: Dalai Lama

message: Get busy living or get busy dying.
author: Stephen King

message: You have within you right now, everything you need to deal with whatever the world can throw at you.
author: Brian Tracy

message: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

message: The only impossible journey is the one you never begin.
author: Tony Robbins

message: Life is short, and it's up to you to make it sweet.
author: Sarah Louise Delany

message: The best way to predict the future is to invent it.
author: Alan Kay

message: Your time is limited, don't waste it living someone else's life.
author: Steve Jobs

message: Success is not how high you have climbed, but how you make a positive difference to the world.
author: Roy T. Bennett

message: The best revenge is massive success.
author: Frank Sinatra

message: In the end, we only regret the chances we didn’t take.
author: Lewis Carroll

message: Go confidently in the direction of your dreams! Live the life you’ve imagined.
author: Henry David Thoreau

message: Change the world by being yourself.
author: Amy Poehler

message: What you get by achieving your goals is not as important as what you become by achieving your goals.
author: Zig Ziglar

message: Happiness is not something ready-made. It comes from your own actions.
author: Dalai Lama

message: Dream as if you’ll live forever, live as if you’ll die today.
author: James Dean

message: If you can dream it, you can do it.
author: Walt Disney

message: Life is not measured by the number of breaths we take, but by the moments that take our breath away.
author: Maya Angelou

message: Everything you’ve ever wanted is on the other side of fear.
author: George Addair

message: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow is our doubts of today.
author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

message: Do not wait to strike till the iron is hot; but make it hot by striking.
author: William Butler Yeats

message: Do what you can, with what you have, where you are.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

message: Action is the foundational key to all success.
author: Pablo Picasso

message: Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it.
author: Henry David Thoreau

message: The only limit to our achievement is our imagination.
author: Anonymous

message: Start where you are. Use what you have. Do what you can.
author: Arthur Ashe

message: Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success. If you love what you are doing, you will be successful.
author: Albert Schweitzer

message: Keep your face always toward the sunshine—and shadows will fall behind you.
author: Walt Whitman

message: We may encounter many defeats but we must not be defeated.
author: Maya Angelou

message: Opportunities don't happen. You create them.
author: Chris Grosser

message: Love the life you live. Live the life you love.
author: Bob Marley

message: I attribute my success to this: I never gave or took any excuse.
author: Florence Nightingale

message: Success is not in what you have, but who you are.
author: Bo Bennett

message: Life is 10% what happens to us and 90% how we react to it.
author: Charles R. Swindoll

message: If you want something you've never had, you must be willing to do something you've never done.
author: Thomas Jefferson

message: You miss 100% of the shots you don’t take.
author: Wayne Gretzky

message: Don't watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
author: Sam Levenson

message: The secret of getting ahead is getting started.
author: Mark Twain

message: It's not whether you get knocked down, it's whether you get up.
author: Vince Lombardi

message: Don't be pushed around by the fears in your mind. Be led by the dreams in your heart.
author: Roy T. Bennett

message: Everything you can imagine is real.
author: Pablo Picasso

message: Life isn’t about finding yourself. Life is about creating yourself.
author: George Bernard Shaw

message: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
author: Walt Disney

message: Success seems to be connected with action. Successful people keep moving.
author: Conrad Hilton

message: Our greatest glory is not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
author: Confucius

message: Difficulties in life are intended to make us better, not bitter.
author: Dan Reeves

message: You must be the change you wish to see in the world.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

message: The only person you are destined to become is the person you decide to be.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
